DocAttribute.Name: SpaceProgramIdentifier
DocAttribute.Documentation: Identifier for this space program. It often refers to a number (or code) assigned to the space program. Example: R-001.

DocAttribute.Name: MaxRequiredArea
DocAttribute.Documentation: The maximum floor area programmed for this space (according to client requirements)

DocAttribute.Name: MinRequiredArea
DocAttribute.Documentation: The minimum floor area programmed for this space (according to client requirements)

DocAttribute.Name: RequestedLocation
DocAttribute.Documentation: Location within the building structure, requested for the space.

DocAttribute.Name: StandardRequiredArea
DocAttribute.Documentation: The floor area programmed for this space (according to client requirements).

DocAttribute.Name: HasInteractionReqsFrom
DocAttribute.Documentation: Set of inverse relationships to space or work interaction requirement objects (FOR RelatedObject).

DocAttribute.Name: HasInteractionReqsTo
DocAttribute.Documentation: Set of inverse relationships to space or work interaction requirements (FOR RelatingObject).
